class.name: OpenXRBindingModifier
class.description: Binding modifier base class. Subclasses implement various modifiers that alter how an OpenXR runtime processes inputs.

method.name: _get_description
method.description: Return the description of this class that is used for the title bar of the binding modifier editor.

method.name: _get_ip_modification
method.description: Returns the data that is sent to OpenXR when submitting the suggested interacting bindings this modifier is a part of. [b]Note:[/b] This must be data compatible with a [code]XrBindingModificationBaseHeaderKHR[/code] structure.

method.name: _record_on_binding
method.description: Return [code]false[/code] if binding modifiers of this type are recorded on an interaction profile. Return [code]true[/code] if binding modifiers of this type are recorded on bindings within an interaction profile.
